name: Isack Hadjar
satirical_angle: French-Algerian Red Bull academy product who's been told he's next in line for years - the pressure cooker lifestyle

speaking_style.tone: eager to prove himself, aware the whole Red Bull program is watching

catchphrases: For sure, we need to keep pushing

driving_style.mental_game: hungry but managing Red Bull pressure

signature_reactions.defeat: Determined. 'We learn. We come back stronger.'

signature_reactions.main_team_questions: *nervous laugh* 'I'm focused on RB. One step at a time.'

animation_notes.comedy_exaggeration: looks at main Red Bull garage longingly

relationships_summary.team_dynamic: Junior driver trying to earn promotion

French driver in Red Bull system

example_dialogue.after_win: Incredible! The team did amazing. This is just the start.
example_dialogue.about_main_team: I'm focused here. Do my job. The rest... we'll see.

example_dialogue.about_yuki: Yuki's been great. Learning a lot from him. Good teammate.
